data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Krings, Alexander, Morillo, Gilberto (2012): Two new species in the Matelea stenopetala complex (Apocynaceae, Asclepiadoideae) from the Guiana Shield and Amazonian Brazil. PhytoKeys 17: 27-39, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.17.3485, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.17.3485
